meanings.definition: The feeling of great surprise or wonder.
meanings.sent1: Her face showed amazements when she saw the magician perform tricks.
meanings.sent2: The fireworks display filled the crowd with amazements.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's amazements at seeing snow for the first time were adorable.
meanings.sent4: The beauty of the sunset brought amazements to all who witnessed it.
meanings.sent5: The children's amazements at the zoo made the trip unforgettable.

meanings.definition: Things that cause great surprise or wonder.
meanings.sent1: The museum was full of historical amazements that captivated visitors.
meanings.sent2: Exploring the ancient ruins revealed hidden amazements at every turn.
meanings.sent3: The box of magic tricks held endless amazements for the curious children.
meanings.sent4: The book was a treasure trove of literary amazements waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The galaxy is full of cosmic amazements that continue to astound scientists.
